answers.answer: Some doctors will prescibe that for pain.I would exhaust every other non addictive/non narcotic/non opioid option there is before going back to subs.

question: I have been on pain meds for pain in the past. Then I started suboxson program for addiction to pain pillow. I have been on suboxson program for three years and changed my life. Now that I have completed program I'm in pain again do to nerve pain in legs due to diabetes and have tried nerioten and another med that starts with a letter L thats on TV. But that make me feel drunk and sleepy. Can dodgers prescribe small dose of suboxson for chronic pain.
title: Can Dr. Prescribe suboxson for pain other then just rehab.
